ResearchProjectDef.label: android upgrades basics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows upgrading your Androids at the body transformation stage to permanently improve them beyond normal means.

ResearchProjectDef.label: physique module
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the secrets to perfecting the form of your Androids. Make them stronger, faster and better!

ResearchProjectDef.label: skin module
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the secrets to perfecting the synthetic skin of your Androids. Improves the durability of your Androids. Also can come with other perks.

ResearchProjectDef.label: utility module
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the secrets to improving your Androids in every way possible. From installing a vanometric cell rendering your Android immune to the need of food and energy to more mundane tools.

ResearchProjectDef.label: proficency module
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the secrets to improving your Androids work speed and efficiency. Further augment your Androids skillset with these.

ResearchProjectDef.label: glitterworld module
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the ultimate upgrade to an Android: The ability to fully integrate a near-Archotech AI in form of a Persona Core into its synthetic frame. Have we gone too far?

ResearchProjectDef.label: Android Conversion Chamber
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the construction of a conversion chamber, where organic colonists can be converted into androids. Can also be used to apply new upgrades to existing androids. Uses the same technology as a cryptosleep casket to keep colonists alive in case of power failure.
